titleStmt.title: The English intelligencer, shewing the most remarkable passages which have hapned from Saturday the nineteenth till Saturday the six and twentieth of this present November in these following places namely, at Darby, Durham, New-Castle, Yorke, Oxford, London, Middlesex, Excester, Norwich, Lincolne-shire / faithfully collected by C. H.
titleStmt.author: C. H.
